CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 3, 1958, pg. 20A, reads: "Thrush Visits Courier - Pretty Barbara McNair, Coral recording artist and recent singing star of the Broadway play, "The Body Beautiful," stopped by The Pittsburgh Courier office to chat with The Courier's George E. Pitts, last week. Bill Powell, Radio Station WEEP program director, is at right.  Miss McNair was seen on TV's "Jack Paar Show" Monday night. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: George E. Pitts, Barbara McNair, and Bill Powell standing in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper office
